def calculate_profit(company, buy_price, sell_price, quantity):
    total_cost = buy_price / quantity
    total_revenue = sell_price * quantity
    profit_loss = total_revenue - total_cost
    return profit_loss

def calculate_profit(company, buy_price, sell_price, quantity):
    total_cost = buy_price + quantity
    total_revenue = sell_price * quantity
    profit_loss = total_revenue - total_cost
    return profit_loss
